shot.composition: POV high-speed race just behind a vibrant, oxygen-rich red blood cell ascending the massive curve of the aortic arch. 16:9.
shot.lens: Extreme macro bio-lens with dynamic motion blur and shallow depth of field
shot.camera_movement: Rapid ascent, high-velocity tracking shot with sharp banking maneuvers following the curve of the aorta, synchronized with the systolic pulse.

subject.description: A lead red blood cell, perfectly biconcave and shimmering with a bright cherry-red color. Surrounded by a torrent of other cells and sparkling platelets rushing past at extreme speed.
subject.props: Faintly glowing oxygen molecules attached to the hemoglobin.

scene.location: The Aortic Arch, Human Circulatory System
scene.environment: A massive, pulsating organic tunnel. Walls are highly detailed with textured endothelial cells, showing elasticity and immense strength. Plasma is a warm golden-crimson.

visual_details.action: Camera weaves between dense clusters of cells, navigating the immense pressure and high-speed flow, dodging turbulence near the branching arteries.
visual_details.special_effects: Realistic fluid dynamics simulation (CFD visualization style), velocity lines, light refraction through plasma, subtle lens flares.
visual_details.negative_prompt_video: Blur, blurry foreground, slow motion, stuttering movement, low resolution, compression artifacts, grey, black and white, minimalism, simple shapes, darkness, cartoonish.

cinematography.lighting: Dramatic, warm subsurface scattering glow emanating from the blood itself, high-contrast highlights on the vessel walls.
cinematography.color_palette: Rich crimson, vibrant cherry red, warm gold, translucent whites.

audio.music: Fast-paced hybrid orchestral-electronic score, epic Hans Zimmer style, with driving percussion (Taiko drums) and soaring brass.
audio.ambient: Deep, thunderous rhythmic thudding of the heartbeat (LUB-DUB), constant roar of pressurized fluid.
audio.sound_effects: High-velocity whooshes as cells pass the camera, subtle impact sounds of turbulence.
